source: TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_01<tab>Well met, friend. I am in charge of storing property lost during the Calamity.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_01我々は、先の霊災で大量に発生した遺失物を
持ち主や遺族に返還するための事業を行っています。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_Q1<tab>Are you here to reclaim your belongings?

target: TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_A2<tab>遺失物について説明を聞く

source: TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_05<tab>Countless souls went missing during the Calamity, and a veritable mountain of articles was left ownerless. The Adventurers' Guild has been holding such articles in safekeeping in hopes that their owners will one day reclaim them.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_05霊災にて持ち主が行方不明になった品を、
我々、冒険者ギルドが預かっているのです。
持ち主や遺族の方が見つけて返還するためにね。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_06<tab>Please be warned, however, that we are <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> a storage service. The items you retrieve become your sole responsibility, and cannot be returned to us under any circumstance.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_06もちろん、我々は貸倉庫をやっている訳ではありません。
一度、返還した品を、ふたたび預かることは
できませんから、あしからず。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_10<tab>Fewer folk come forward to reclaim their belongings with each passing day.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_10近頃では、遺失物を引き取りに来る人も
めっきり少なくなってしまいました。

source: TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_11<tab>It saddens me to think that some items will remain in our safekeeping forever, their owners never to return.
target:
TEXT_CMNDEFTEMPORARYBAG_00083_TALK_ACTOR_11みなさん、もう心の整理を付けていらっしゃるのでしょうね……。
我々の役目は、もう終わったのかもしれません。
